Returns: a touch listener that controls drag-to-open behavior, or null on unsupported APIs
Parameters: Object: the PopupMenu against which to invoke the method
getDragToOpenListener(java.lang.Object).Description: On API @B_android#os#Build#VERSION_CODES#KITKAT_E@ and higher, returns an @B_android#view#View#OnTouchListener_E@ that can be added to the anchor view to implement drag-to-open behavior. When the listener is set on a view, touching that view and dragging outside of its bounds will open the popup window. Lifting will select the currently touched list item. Example usage:
